CustomField.description: This field is used only for Case Email Routing Logic "EmailMessageServices". It is specifically used in the Update Queue Owner WF rule, which is then used in Apex. This field is used when a customer replies back to a case but the email they send to is not billing, or collections. If a customer replies to a case and sends to an email that is not Billing or Collections, then assign to the latest Queue, and if no Queue assign to user.
CustomField.label: Latest Queue Owner
